context: Analyze this supine backbend pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Fish Pose (Matsyasana) Backbend lying on back with crown of head on ground. Consider the Throat opening, heart center opening, shoulder flexibility. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Backbend lying on back with crown of head on ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Throat opening, heart center opening, shoulder flexibility

specificNeeds: Throat opening, heart center opening, shoulder flexibility
